content.rendered:
Kremmling sits along the mighty Colorado river in between Byers and Gore Canyons. It is a small town with a true western feel, but don’t let that fool you! There is a ton to do in and around Kremmling that will leave you longing for more. So, enjoy the mountain air and all Kremmling has to offer with just a few of many great options.

Whitewater Rafting 
When you reside on the Colorado river, the options to raft are many. Kremmling is a rafting hotbed and has so many opportunities to push your limits on the water. Enjoy the challenge of a class IV of class V rapid and be the envy of all your friends back home. Take a picture home with you to put on your desk as you relive your white water experience over and over. So, get your wetsuit on, and get ready to tame the mighty Colorado with AVA Rafting!

Colorado River Headwaters Scenic Byway
Up for some breathtaking views and a relaxing drive? Well then, this is the spot for you. Let your mind wander as you take in the ever changing backdrop, and snow capped peaks in the distance. Called “Trough Road”, you’ll find everything you wanted in a relaxing mountain drive as get a serious dose of the rockies and what the west was meant to be!

Hot Sulphur Springs &  Wildlife Area
After a long drive, great hike, or battling the Colorado on a raft, it’s time to reward yourself. A  rejuvenating dip in the hot sulphur springs is just what the doctor ordered. Located conveniently near Kremmling, you’ll get all the rewards of a first class spa for just the price of nature itself. These natural springs will get you ready for the next days activities. As, for wildlife, enjoy a picnic and high end fishing, hunting and camping in the immediate area. Something for everyone as you relax and just take it all in.

Rocky Mountain National Park
So much to say about this natural wonder. Less than an hour from Kremmling, take the drive to Rocky Mountain National Park (RMNP) and enjoy the Rockies in all their glory. From it’s stunning views to endless activities this treasure has some of the best outdoor activities in all the world. So, take the extra time and go explore!

This small, unassuming town yet wonderful town has so much to offer in addition to it’s natural beauty. Weather it’s a drive, a paddle, or just basking in the hot springs, Kremmling is a perfect stop to enjoy Colorado as it was meant to be. So, gear up, get your camera ready and enjoy a perfect Rocky Mountain getaway!
